name: Emotions: Social MeDie
description:
Spending too much time on Social Media? Has your virtual life become more important than the real one? Can't get off yourself away from your smartphone? So be careful, because your every interaction will affect your emotions and if they become too intense they could turn into real Demons that you'll have to face when display turns off.

Emotions: Social MeDie is the Free prologue focused only on Social Media of the project: "Project Emotions" currently under development, this version does not represent the final product, which will be richer in content, with deeper mechanics and a overall more complex and complete gaming experience. Its purpose is to introduce the core mechanics and immerse the player in the overall atmosphere that will be in the full game.



Game Features
  • Control your emotions, if they reach their maximum value you will lose.
  • Obtain as many Followers as possible and increase your score.
  • Interact with social media to obtein new cards, every interactions will also enhance the Demons's power.
  • Fight 21 different Demons.
  • Hundreds of AI generated illustrations, 6 main emotions, 30 cards, 21 Demons, 7 possible endings.

Between Simulation and Survival, a strategy game with Horror tints
Relax using social media but not too much...when display turns off you will be forced to face your Demons who will try to take you out. Can you survive long enough?
